verses.verse: And as He was going <WG1607> out of the temple, <WG2413> one <WG1520> of His disciples <WG3101> said <WG3004> to Him, "Teacher, <WG1320> behold <WG2396> what <WG4217> wonderful <WG4217> stones <WG3037> and what <WG4217> wonderful <WG4217> buildings! <WG3619>"

And Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, "Do you see <WG991> these <WG3778> great <WG3173> buildings <WG3619>? Not one stone <WG3037> shall be left <WG863> upon another <WG3037> which <WG3739> will not be torn <WG2647> down. <WG2647>"

And as He was sitting <WG2521> on the Mount <WG3735> of Olives <WG1636> opposite <WG2713> the temple, <WG2413> Peter <WG4074> and James <WG2385> and John <WG2491> and Andrew <WG406> were questioning <WG1905> Him privately, <WG2596> <WG2398>

"Tell <WG3004> us, when <WG4219> will these <WG3778> things <WG3778> be, and what <WG5101> [will be] the sign <WG4592> when <WG3752> all <WG3956> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> are going <WG3195> to be fulfilled <WG4931>?"
And Jesus <WG2424> began <WG757> to say <WG3004> to them, "See <WG991> to it that no <WG3361> one <WG5100> misleads <WG4105> you.
"Many <WG4183> will come <WG2064> in My name, <WG3686> saying, <WG3004> 'I am <WG1510> [He!'] and will mislead <WG4105> many. <WG4183>

"And when <WG3752> you hear <WG191> of wars <WG4171> and rumors <WG189> of wars, <WG4171> do not be frightened; <WG2360> [those things] must <WG1163> take <WG1096> place; <WG1096> but [that is] not yet <WG3768> the end. <WG5056>

"For nation <WG1484> will arise <WG1453> against <WG1909> nation, <WG1484> and kingdom <WG932> against <WG1909> kingdom; <WG932> there will be earthquakes <WG4578> in various <WG2596> places; <WG5117> there will [also] be famines. <WG3042> These <WG3778> things <WG3778> are [merely] the beginning <WG746> of birth <WG5604> pangs. <WG5604>

"But be on your guard; <WG991> for they will deliver <WG3860> you to [the] courts, <WG4892> and you will be flogged <WG1194> in [the] synagogues, <WG4864> and you will stand <WG2476> before <WG1909> governors <WG2232> and kings <WG935> for My sake, <WG1752> as a testimony <WG3142> to them.
"And the gospel <WG2098> must <WG1163> first <WG4413> be preached <WG2784> to all <WG3956> the nations. <WG1484>

"And when <WG3752> they arrest <WG71> you and deliver <WG3860> you up, do not be anxious <WG4305> beforehand <WG4305> about what <WG5101> you are to say, <WG2980> but say <WG2980> whatever <WG3739> <WG1437> is given <WG1325> you in that hour; <WG5610> for it is not you who speak, <WG2980> but [it is] the Holy <WG40> Spirit. <WG4151>

"And brother <WG80> will deliver <WG3860> brother <WG80> to death, <WG2288> and a father <WG3962> [his] child; <WG5043> and children <WG5043> will rise <WG1881> up against <WG1909> parents <WG1118> and have them put <WG2289> to death. <WG2289>
"And you will be hated <WG3404> by all <WG3956> on account <WG1223> of My name, <WG3686> but the one who endures <WG5278> to the end, <WG5056> he shall be saved. <WG4982>

"But when <WG3752> you see <WG3708> the abomination <WG946> of desolation <WG2050> standing <WG2476> where <WG3699> it should <WG1163> not be (let the reader <WG314> understand <WG3539>), then <WG5119> let those <WG3588> who <WG3588> are in Judea <WG2453> flee <WG5343> to the mountains. <WG3735>
"And let him who <WG3588> is on the housetop <WG1430> not go <WG2597> down, <WG2597> or <WG3366> enter <WG1525> in, to get <WG142> anything <WG5100> out of his house; <WG3614>
and let him who <WG3588> is in the field <WG68> not turn <WG1994> back <WG3694> <WG1994> to get <WG142> his cloak. <WG2440>
"But woe <WG3759> to those <WG3588> who are with child <WG1722> <WG1064> and to those <WG3588> who nurse <WG2337> babes <WG2337> in those <WG1565> days! <WG2250>
"But pray <WG4336> that it may not happen <WG1096> in the winter. <WG5494>

"For those <WG1565> days <WG2250> will be a [time of] tribulation <WG2347> such <WG3634> as has not occurred <WG1096> since <WG575> the beginning <WG746> of the creation <WG2937> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> created, <WG2936> until <WG2193> now, <WG3568> and never <WG3756> <WG3361> shall.

"And unless <WG1487> <WG3361> the Lord <WG2962> had shortened <WG2856> [those] days, <WG2250> no <WG3756> <WG3956> life <WG4561> would have been saved; <WG4982> but for the sake <WG1223> of the elect <WG1588> whom <WG3739> He chose, <WG1586> He shortened <WG2856> the days. <WG2250>

"And then <WG5119> if <WG1437> anyone <WG5100> says <WG3004> to you, 'Behold, <WG2396> here <WG5602> is the Christ <WG5547>'; or, 'Behold, <WG2396> [He is] there <WG1563>'; do not believe <WG4100> [him;]

for false <WG5580> Christs <WG5580> and false <WG5578> prophets <WG5578> will arise, <WG1453> and will show <WG4160> signs <WG4592> and wonders, <WG5059> in order, <WG4314> if <WG1487> possible, <WG1415> to lead <WG635> the elect <WG1588> astray. <WG635>
"But take <WG991> heed; <WG991> behold, <WG2400> I have told <WG4275> you everything <WG3956> in advance. <WG4275>
"But in those <WG1565> days, <WG2250> after <WG3326> that tribulation, <WG2347> the sun <WG2246> will be darkened, <WG4654> and the moon <WG4582> will not give <WG1325> its light, <WG5338>
and the stars <WG792> will be falling <WG4098> from heaven, <WG3772> and the powers <WG1411> that are in the heavens <WG3772> will be shaken. <WG4531>
"And then <WG5119> they will see <WG3708> the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> coming <WG2064> in clouds <WG3507> with great <WG4183> power <WG1411> and glory. <WG1391>

"And then <WG5119> He will send <WG649> forth <WG649> the angels, <WG32> and will gather <WG1996> together <WG1996> His elect <WG1588> from the four <WG5064> winds, <WG417> from the farthest <WG206> end <WG206> of the earth, <WG1093> to the farthest <WG206> end <WG206> of heaven. <WG3772>

"Now <WG1161> learn <WG3129> the parable <WG3850> from the fig <WG4808> tree: <WG4808> when <WG3752> its branch <WG2798> has already <WG2235> become <WG1096> tender, <WG527> and puts <WG1631> forth <WG1631> its leaves, <WG5444> you know <WG1097> that summer <WG2330> is near. <WG1451>
"Even so, <WG3779> you too, <WG2532> when <WG3752> you see <WG3708> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> happening, <WG1096> recognize <WG1097> that He is near, <WG1451> [right] at the door. <WG2374>
"Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, this <WG3778> generation <WG1074> will not pass <WG3928> away <WG3928> until <WG3360> all <WG3956> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> take <WG1096> place. <WG1096>
"Heaven <WG3772> and earth <WG1093> will pass <WG3928> away, <WG3928> but My words <WG3056> will not pass <WG3928> away. <WG3928>

"But of that day <WG2250> or <WG2228> hour <WG5610> no <WG3762> one <WG3762> knows, <WG3609> not even <WG3761> the angels <WG32> in heaven, <WG3772> nor <WG3761> the Son, <WG5207> but the Father <WG3962> [alone.]
"Take <WG991> heed, <WG991> keep <WG69> on the alert; <WG69> for you do not know <WG3609> when <WG4219> the [appointed] time <WG2540> is.

["It is] like <WG5613> a man, <WG444> away <WG590> on a journey, <WG590> [who] upon leaving <WG863> his house <WG3614> and putting <WG1325> his slaves <WG1401> in charge, <WG1849> [assigning] to each <WG1538> one <WG1538> his task, <WG2041> also <WG2532> commanded <WG1781> the doorkeeper <WG2377> to stay <WG1127> on the alert. <WG1127>

"Therefore, <WG3767> be on the alert <WG1127> – for you do not know <WG3609> when <WG4219> the master <WG2962> of the house <WG3614> is coming, <WG2064> whether <WG2228> in the evening, <WG3796> at midnight, <WG3317> at cockcrowing, <WG219> or <WG2228> in the morning <WG4404> –
lest <WG3361> he come <WG2064> suddenly <WG1810> and find <WG2147> you asleep. <WG2518>
"And what <WG3739> I say <WG3004> to you I say <WG3004> to all, <WG3956> 'Be on the alert! <WG1127>'"
